name: test_1220_Create_Post_In_Community
description:
Test that an admin can make posts in the communities and posts should be shown to end users in "All" and "Admin" tabs.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Community page
4. Create a post with image and publish it
5. Verify the post is created and displayed
6. Create another post and save as draft
descriptionHtml:
Test that an admin can make posts in the communities and posts should be shown to end users in "All" and "Admin" tabs.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Community page
  4. Create a post with image and publish it
  5. Verify the post is created and displayed
  6. Create another post and save as draft

    def test_1220_Create_Post_In_Community():
        with sync_playwright() as p:
            # Launch browser
            browser = p.chromium.launch()
            page = browser.new_page()
    
            # Login using the existing login class
            login_page = LoginPage(page)
            login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw)
    
            # Navigate to the Community page
            community_page = CommunityPage(page)
            community_page.go_to_community()
